duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a team of BI professionals and oversee their development, growth, and performance.
Partner with stakeholders, process specialists, business, and IT Data Warehouse Team to elicit and document business requirements for new reports.
Translates data results into written reports, tables, graphs, and charts to convey information to management.
Design, develop, and maintain reports and analytical tools. Perform quality assurance against new reports or other team member reports.
Perform ongoing monitoring and refinement of reports and provide technical support for existing reports, dashboards, or other tools.
Create ad hoc reports and views on a frequent basis to assist management in understanding, researching, and analyzing issues.
Teach and advocate the use of business intelligence tools across levels of the organization and handle Data Warehouse help desk tickets as assigned.
Participate in due diligence and evaluation of systems and developing integration timeline and communications.
Participate in cross-organizational teams to develop solutions meeting the needs of SP&C.
Manage BI Analyst progress on reports, as assigned and perform other duties as assigned. Some travel may be required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in data analytics, data science, computer science, management information systems, finance, statistics, or related field required; MBA or post-graduate degree preferred.
